gen:link.msg:message: `ChangeProvisionPensionObligationsOnBehalfOfParticipants` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementParticipantsPremiumPensionInstitutions_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChangeProvisionPensionObligationsOnBehalfOfParticipants')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementParticipantsPremiumPensionInstitutions_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChangeProvisionPensionObligationsOnBehalfOfParticipants return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementParticipantsPremiumPensionInstitutions_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfChangeProvisionPensionObligationsOnBehalfOfParticipantsCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementParticipantsPremiumPensionInstitutions_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfChangeProvisionPensionObligationsOnBehalfOfParticipantsCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementParticipantsPremiumPensionInstitutions_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfChangeProvisionPensionObligationsOnBehalfOfParticipantsDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementParticipantsPremiumPensionInstitutions_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfChangeProvisionPensionObligationsOnBehalfOfParticipantsDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
